text:
We're been making games all week long
With a paddle and a net, you can't go wrong
My table has four legs to keep it strong
And my name rhymes with donkey kong

Where am I?

With treats and sweets, I'm full of delight
With snacks and packs, I'm worth a bite
Scan your card, to receive your wish
I'm ready to go, without a dish
Push to open, no need to bend
I'm open 24/7 ready to vend

What am I?

This is the 3rd story you'll have
I'm at the top of staircase,
On this level, you need to use your brain
Don't get psyched out, that's my claim

I give all the dimensions
For creators inventions
I'm easy to learn, so no complaining
Go to our website, and book a training
All my resources are free, which is essential
For all of you to unleash your potential
